Wondrous item, uncommon (+1), rare (+2), or very rare (+3)
These leather hand wraps are padded across the knuckles. You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with unarmed strikes while wearing these hand wraps. The bonus is determined by the itemâ€™s rarity.
